resources.string: Which planet is known as the "Red Planet"?
Which planet is closest to the Sun?
Mars is known as the "Red Planet" due to its reddish appearance from iron oxide, or rust, on its surface.
Mercury is the planet closest to the Sun and has the fastest orbit.
Venus is the hottest planet in our solar system, with surface temperatures hot enough to melt lead.
